footer-copyright-text: Theshopier© 2015 powered by Wordpress ™. All rights reserved
color_xml_editor:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<colour>

	<item>
		<title>Body</title>
		<id>body-color-section-start</id>
		<subtitle>The header top colour</subtitle>
		<type>section</type>
		<indent>true</indent>
	</item>	

	<item>
		<title>Brand Color</title>
		<id>brand-color</id>
		<subtitle>Brand color</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#ffd200</def>
		<output>
			<color>
				.vc_tta-container .vc_tta-style-classic.vc_tta-tabs.vc_general.nth-tab-style4 .vc_tta-tab > a:hover,
				header .nth-menu-vertical .vertical-menu-inner > ul.menu > li:hover > a,
				header .pc-menu > .menu > li:hover > a,
				header .nth-sale-policy .pc-menu .menu > li.menu-item-has-children:hover > .menu-drop-icon,
				header .pc-menu > .menu li.menu-item-has-children .sub-menu > li > a:hover,
				header .pc-menu > .menu li.menu-item-has-children:hover > .menu-drop-icon,
				header .pc-menu > .menu li.menu-item-has-children .sub-menu li:hover > a,
				header .pc-menu.vertical-menu-inner > ul.menu > li > .sub-menu li.menu-item:hover > a,
				header .pc-menu.vertical-menu-inner > ul.menu > li:hover > a,
				header .nth_header_bottom.header-tablet-bottom .nth-menu-wrapper .main-menu > ul.menu > li.menu-item:hover > a,
				.pc-menu > .menu > li:hover > a,
				.pc-menu > .menu > li.current-menu-item > a,
				.pc-menu.vertical-menu-inner > ul.menu > li.current-menu-item > a, 
				.pc-menu.vertical-menu-inner > ul.menu > li > .sub-menu li.menu-item .sub-menu li:hover > a,
				header .pc-menu .menu > li.menu-item-has-children.current-menu-item > .menu-drop-icon
			</color>
			<bdcolor>
				.heading-title.border-bottom-solid,
				.vc_tta-container .vc_tta-style-classic.vc_tta-tabs.vc_general.nth-tab-style4 .vc_tta-tab.vc_active > a:after, 
				header .nth-searchform .nth-search-wrapper
			</bdcolor>
			<bgcolor>
				header .nth-searchform .nth-search-wrapper .icon-nth-search,
				header .nth-menu-vertical .vertical-menu-wrapper .vertical-menu-dropdown,
				header .nth-menu-vertical .vertical-menu-inner > ul.menu,
				header .nth-mini-popup .nth-shopping-hover .icon-nth-cart::after
			</bgcolor>
		</output>
	</item>

	<item>
		<title>Brand Darker Color</title>
		<id>brand-darker-color</id>
		<subtitle>Brand darker color</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#dab300</def>
		<output>
			<bdcolor>
				header .nth-menu-vertical .vertical-menu-inner > ul.menu > li > a
			</bdcolor>
		</output>
	</item>
	

	<item>
		<title>Sub Brand Color</title>
		<id>sub-brand-color</id>
		<subtitle>Price color, Woocommerce product title, Category title</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#3a83d4</def>
		<output>
			<color>
				span.amount,
				.woocommerce .nth-woo-shortcode ul.product_list_widget li a:hover,
				.product_subcaterories .woo-subcat-wrapper .cat-title,
				.product_subcaterories .sub-cat li a:hover,
				.products_super_deal .product .product-title a:hover,
				.aio-icon-box .aio-icon-title,
				header .nth_header_middle .text-right,
				
				a:hover, a:focus, p.lost_password a,
				
				h3.post-title a, h2.post-title a,
				.woocommerce .products section.product .product-inner h3.product-title a:hover, .woocommerce-page .products section.product .product-inner h3.product-title a:hover,
				.woocommerce .products section.product .product-inner .product-cats a, .woocommerce-page .products section.product .product-inner .product-cats a,
				.read-more a.button:hover, a.button.button-border:hover,
				span.amount,
				
				.wpb_tabs ul.wpb_tabs_nav.nth-boxed > li.ui-state-active a, .wpb_tabs ul.wpb_tabs_nav.nth-boxed > li:hover a,
				.nth-shortcode .nth_products_categories_shortcode .shortcode-woo-tabs li.active a, .nth-shortcode .nth_products_categories_shortcode .shortcode-woo-tabs li:hover a,
				html .wpb_accordion .wpb_accordion_wrapper .wpb_accordion_section .wpb_accordion_header.ui-accordion-header-active a,
				
				#footer .nth-product-categories-wrapper a:hover,
				
				.nth-shortcode.recent-comments ul > li h3 a,
				.nth-shortcode.nth-pricing ul.nth-pricing-ul li.desc,
				
				.nth-quickshop-wrapper div.product .woocommerce-product-rating .star-rating + a, .woocommerce-page div.product .woocommerce-product-rating .star-rating + a,
				.text-color1, .nth-form-single .nth-form-wrapper [type=submit]:hover:before,
				.nth-mini-popup .nth-shopping-hover span.cart-total span.amount,
				.woocommerce .yith-wcwl-add-to-wishlist a:hover, 
				.woocommerce-page .yith-wcwl-add-to-wishlist a:hover,
				.woocommerce a.compare:hover, 
				.woocommerce a.nth-compare:hover,
				.woocommerce-page a.compare:hover,
				.woocommerce-page a.nth-compare:hover,
				.woocommerce a.button.nth_quickshop_link:hover,
				footer a:hover,
				header .nth_header_top .nth-mini-popup-cotent .nth-mini-popup-footer a,
				.lost_password a:hover,
				.post-meta .author a,
				.cart_totals .shipping-calculator-button,
				.cart_totals table .order-total span.amount,
				.woocommerce table.cart td.actions a.button:hover,
				.woocommerce table.woocommerce-checkout-review-order-table tfoot tr.order-total td span.amount, 
				.woocommerce table.order_details tfoot tr.order-total td span.amount,
				.woocommerce-checkout .nth-checkout-heading a, 
				.woocommerce-checkout h3 a,
				header .nth-mini-popup .nth-mini-popup-cotent p.total span.amount,
				.nth-portfolios-wrapper .nth-portfolio-content .nth-portfolio-item .nth-portfolio-thumb .summary h3 a:hover,
				li.widget.widget_product_categories li.current-cat > a, 
				li.widget.widget_categories li.current-cat > a,
				header .nth-mini-popup .nth-shopping-hover span.cart-total span.amount
			</color>
			<bgcolor>
				.product-labels .featured,
				.product.prod_style_6 .product-inner .add_to_cart_button,
				header .nth-shopping-cart,
				header .nth-mini-popup.nth-shopping-cart:hover,

				.woocommerce .wishlist_table td.product-add-to-cart a, .woocommerce a.product_type_grouped, .woocommerce a.product_type_external, .woocommerce a.button.add_to_cart_button, .woocommerce a.product_type_grouped, .woocommerce a.product_type_external, .woocommerce a.button.out_stock, .woocommerce .button.alt.single_add_to_cart_button, .woocommerce-page .wishlist_table td.product-add-to-cart a, .woocommerce-page a.product_type_grouped, .woocommerce-page a.product_type_external, .woocommerce-page a.button.out_stock, .woocommerce-page a.button.add_to_cart_button, .woocommerce-page .button.alt.single_add_to_cart_button,
				a.button, button, html input[type="button"], input[type="reset"], input[type="submit"], .btn-primary,
				
				header .nth-mini-popup .nth-shopping-hover .icon-nth-cart:after,
				header .nth_header_toolbar .nth-shopping-cart-item span:after,

				.nth-sidebar ul.widgets-sidebar > li.widget_calendar #wp-calendar #today,
				.entry-date .entry-month,
				.nth_header_toolbar > div > div > a span:after,
				.nth-shopping-cart:hover,
				footer form.mc4wp-form-theme button[type=submit],
				footer form.mc4wp-form button[type=submit],
				header .login-submit a,
				header .login-submit input[type="submit"],
				.wp-pagenavi ul li a.prev,
				.wp-pagenavi ul li a.next,
				.woocommerce button.button,
				.woocommerce .widget_price_filter .price_slider_wrapper .ui-slider-horizontal .ui-slider-handle, 
				.woocommerce-page .widget_price_filter .price_slider_wrapper .ui-slider-horizontal .ui-slider-handle,
				.woocommerce .widget_price_filter .price_slider_wrapper .ui-slider-horizontal .ui-slider-range, 
				.woocommerce-page .widget_price_filter .price_slider_wrapper .ui-slider-horizontal .ui-slider-range,
				.woocommerce .nth-shopping-progress-wrapper ul li.active,
				.woocommerce .nth-shopping-progress-wrapper ul li.active:before,
				.cart_totals .wc-proceed-to-checkout > input.button,
				.woocommerce input.button,
				.woocommerce nav.woocommerce-pagination ul li .next, 
				.woocommerce nav.woocommerce-pagination ul li .prev, 
				.woocommerce-page nav.woocommerce-pagination ul li .next, 
				.woocommerce-page nav.woocommerce-pagination ul li .prev,
				.woocommerce .woocommerce-error .button, 
				.woocommerce .woocommerce-info .button, 
				.woocommerce .woocommerce-message .button,
				.woocommerce a.button
			</bgcolor>
			<bdcolor>
				.read-more a.button:hover, 
				a.button.button-border:hover, 
				.heading-title:after, 
				.heading-title.ud-line:after,
				input[type="email"]:focus, 
				input[type="search"]:focus, 
				input[type="password"]:focus, 
				input[type="tel"]:focus, 
				input.input-text:focus, 
				input[type="text"]:focus,
				.woocommerce div.product div.images div.thumbnails .owl-wrapper-outer .owl-item a.active, 
				.woocommerce div.product div.images div.thumbnails .owl-stage-outer .owl-item a.active,
				.woocommerce form .form-row.woocommerce-validated .select2-container, 
				.woocommerce form .form-row.woocommerce-validated input.input-text, 
				.woocommerce form .form-row.woocommerce-validated select,
				.woocommerce table.cart td.actions a.button:hover,
				.nth-shopping-progress-wrapper ul li.current-item:after
			</bdcolor>
		</output>
	</item>
	
	<item>
		<title>Color light</title>
		<id>color-light</id>
		<subtitle> Text header, Button color</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#fff</def>
		<output>
			<color>
				header .nth-mini-popup .nth-shopping-hover .icon-nth-cart:after,
				.nth_header_toolbar > div > div > a span:after,
				header .pc-menu .menu > li > a,
				header .nth_header_bottom .nth-tini-wrapper .mini-popup-hover a,
				header .pc-menu .menu > li.menu-item-has-children > .menu-drop-icon,
				footer form.mc4wp-form button[type=submit],
				.wp-pagenavi ul li a.prev:hover,
				.wp-pagenavi ul li a.next:hover
			</color>
			<bgcolor>
				.woocommerce .nth-woo-shortcode .product_list_widget
			</bgcolor>
		</output>		
	</item>
	
	<item>
		<title>First color</title>
		<id>color-1</id>
		<subtitle> Text color, body color </subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#5d5d5d</def>
		<output>
			<color>
				a, 
				p.lost_password a:hover,
				html .wpb_accordion .wpb_accordion_wrapper .wpb_accordion_section .wpb_accordion_header a,
				.woocommerce .products section.product .product-inner .product-cats a:hover, 
				.woocommerce-page .products section.product .product-inner .product-cats a:hover,
				.woocommerce a.button.nth_quickshop_link
			</color>
			<bgcolor></bgcolor>
		</output>		
	</item>
	
	<item>
		<title>Second color</title>
		<id>color-2</id>
		<subtitle>Text, Title, heading </subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#3d3d3d</def>
		<output>
			<color>
				body,
				h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6,
				h1.page-title,
				.woocommerce .products section.product .product-inner h3.product-title a, 
				.woocommerce-page .products section.product .product-inner h3.product-title a,
				
				h3.post-title a:hover, h2.post-title a:hover,
				
				.read-more a.button:hover, a.button.button-border:hover,
				
				.pc-menu.vertical-menu-inner > ul.menu > li > .sub-menu li.menu-item > a,
				.nth-shortcode.recent-comments ul > li h3 a:hover,
				
				.nth-quickshop-wrapper div.product .product_title, 
				.woocommerce-page div.product .product_title,
				.nth-sidebar ul.widgets-sidebar > li .widget-heading h3,


				.product-title,
				.vc_tta-container .vc_tta-style-classic.vc_tta-tabs.vc_general.nth-tab-style4 .vc_tta-tab.vc_active > a:hover,
				.vc_tta-container .vc_tta-style-classic.vc_tta-tabs.vc_general.nth-tab-style4 .vc_tta-tab.vc_active > a,
				.nth-searchform .icon-nth-search:before,
				.woocommerce .yith-wcwl-add-to-wishlist a, 
				.woocommerce-page .yith-wcwl-add-to-wishlist a,
				.woocommerce a.compare, 
				.woocommerce a.nth-compare,
				.woocommerce-page a.compare,
				.woocommerce-page a.nth-compare,
				footer, 
				#footer
			</color>
			<bgcolor>
				header .nth_header_bottom .nth-sale-policy
			</bgcolor>
		</output>		
	</item>
	
	<item>
		<title>Third color</title>
		<id>color-3</id>
		<subtitle>  Title small, Text tabs </subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#8d8d8d</def>
		<output>
			<color>
				.wpb_tabs ul.wpb_tabs_nav.nth-boxed > li a, 
				del span.amount, 
				#footer .nth-product-categories-wrapper a,
				#footer .footer-copyright
			</color>
			<bdcolor>
				footer form.mc4wp-form input[type=email]
			</bdcolor>
		</output>		
	</item>
	
	<item>
		<title>Fourth color</title>
		<id>color-4</id>
		<subtitle>Button hover</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#2878d0</def>
		<output>
			<bgcolor>.woocommerce .wishlist_table td.product-add-to-cart a:disabled[disabled], .woocommerce .wishlist_table td.product-add-to-cart a:disabled, .woocommerce .wishlist_table td.product-add-to-cart a:disabled[disabled]:hover, .woocommerce .wishlist_table td.product-add-to-cart a:disabled:hover, .woocommerce .wishlist_table td.product-add-to-cart a:hover, .woocommerce .woocommerce .button.alt.single_add_to_cart_button:hover, .woocommerce-page .wishlist_table td.product-add-to-cart a:disabled[disabled], .woocommerce-page .wishlist_table td.product-add-to-cart a:disabled, .woocommerce-page .wishlist_table td.product-add-to-cart a:disabled[disabled]:hover, .woocommerce-page .wishlist_table td.product-add-to-cart a:disabled:hover, .woocommerce-page .wishlist_table td.product-add-to-cart a:hover, .woocommerce-page a.product_type_grouped:disabled[disabled], .woocommerce-page a.product_type_grouped:disabled, .woocommerce-page a.button.add_to_cart_button:disabled, .woocommerce-page a.button.add_to_cart_button:disabled[disabled]:hover, .woocommerce-page a.button.add_to_cart_button:disabled:hover, .woocommerce-page a.button.add_to_cart_button:hover, .woocommerce-page .button.alt.single_add_to_cart_button:disabled[disabled], .woocommerce-page .button.alt.single_add_to_cart_button:disabled, .woocommerce-page .button.alt.single_add_to_cart_button:disabled[disabled]:hover, .woocommerce-page .button.alt.single_add_to_cart_button:disabled:hover, .woocommerce-page .button.alt.single_add_to_cart_button:hover,
				footer form.mc4wp-form-theme button[type=submit]:hover,
				footer form.mc4wp-form button[type=submit]:hover,
				.cart_totals .wc-proceed-to-checkout > input.button:hover,
				.woocommerce input.button:hover,
				header .nth-mini-popup .nth-mini-popup-cotent.nth-shopping-cart-content .buttons .button:hover,
				.woocommerce a.button:active,
				.woocommerce .woocommerce-error .button:hover, 
				.woocommerce .woocommerce-info .button:hover, 
				.woocommerce .woocommerce-message .button:hover
			</bgcolor>
		</output>		
	</item>
	
	<item>
		<title>Fifth color</title>
		<id>color-5</id>
		<subtitle>"a" tag color, Label Sale, Coundown color</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#fd6282</def>
		<output>
			<color>
				ins span.amount,
				
				.woocommerce .yith-wcwl-add-to-wishlist .yith-wcwl-wishlistaddedbrowse a, .woocommerce .yith-wcwl-add-to-wishlist .yith-wcwl-wishlistexistsbrowse a, .woocommerce-page .yith-wcwl-add-to-wishlist .yith-wcwl-wishlistaddedbrowse a, .woocommerce-page .yith-wcwl-add-to-wishlist .yith-wcwl-wishlistexistsbrowse a,

				.nth-countdown,
				.prod_style_6 .nth-countdown,
				.products_super_deal .nth-countdown
			</color>

			<bgcolor>
				.product-labels .onsale
			</bgcolor>
			<bdcolor>
				.woocommerce.columns-1 .nth-shortcode-header .heading-title.border-bottom-solid,
				.woocommerce.columns-3 .nth-shortcode-header .heading-title.border-bottom-solid
			</bdcolor>
		</output>		
	</item>
	
	<item>
		<title>Rating Color</title>
		<id>rating-color</id>
		<subtitle>Rating color</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#f88e4f</def>
		<output>
			<color>
				.woocommerce .star-rating:before,
				.woocommerce .star-rating span:before
			</color>
		</output>
	</item>

	<item>
		<title>Border List Color</title>
		<id>border-product-color</id>
		<subtitle>border color</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#dfdfdf</def>
		<output>
			<bdcolor>
				.woocommerce .nth-woo-shortcode ul.product_list_widget,
				.woocommerce .nth-woo-shortcode ul.product_list_widget li,
				.product_subcaterories .owl-stage-outer,
				.product_subcaterories .woo-subcat-item,
				.product_subcaterories .woo-subcat-wrapper,
				.product_subcaterories .owl-carousel .owl-nav > div,
				.table-icon-component .vc_column_container,
				.woocommerce .products,
				.woocommerce.columns-2 .products .prod_style_6,
				.woocommerce.columns-3 .content-inner,
				.woocommerce .products .owl-nav > div,
				.woocommerce-page .products .owl-nav > div,
				.tparrows,
				ul.list-posts li.post-item .post-item-content,
				.nth_stblock_widget .nth-row-grid,
				.products.grid,
				.products.grid .product.prod_style_6,
				.products.grid .product.prod_style_6:before,
				.related .products .owl-stage-outer,
				.woocommerce .products.grid,
				.owl-carousel .owl-nav > div,
				.products_super_deal
			</bdcolor>
		</output>
	</item>

	<item>
		<id>body-color-section-end</id>
		<type>section</type>
		<indent>false</indent>
	</item>

	<item>
		<title>Header</title>
		<id>header-color-section-start</id>
		<subtitle>The header top colour</subtitle>
		<type>section</type>
		<indent>true</indent>
	</item>

	<item>
		<title>Header background</title>
		<id>header-bg-color</id>
		<subtitle> Header background color</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#ffffff</def>
		<output>
			<bgcolor>header#header</bgcolor>
		</output>
	</item>

	<item>
		<title>Header Text Color</title>
		<id>header-top-color</id>
		<subtitle>The header text color</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<output>
			header .nth_header_top a,
			header .text-right a
		</output>
		<def>#5d5d5d</def>
	</item>

	<item>
		<title>Text Shipping Color</title>
		<id>text-shipping-color</id>
		<subtitle>The text free shipping header color</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<output>
			<color>header .text-right p</color>
		</output>
		<def>#1b75bb</def>
	</item>

	<item>
		<title>Footer</title>
		<id>footer-color-section-start</id>
		<subtitle>The header top colour</subtitle>
		<type>section</type>
		<indent>true</indent>
	</item>

	<item>
		<title>Footer Copyright Background</title>
		<id>footer-copyright-bg-color</id>
		<subtitle>The footer copyright background color</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<output>
			<bgcolor>#footer .footer-copyright</bgcolor>
		</output>
		<def>#f7f7f7</def>
	</item>
	
</colour>
font_xml_editor:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<fonts>
	<font>
		<title>Header Font</title>
		<id>header-font</id>
		<subtitle>Header font subtitle</subtitle>
		<google>1</google>
		<output>header, #header</output>
		<def>
			<color>#5d5d5d</color>
			<size>13px</size>
			<family>Poppins</family>
			<weight>400</weight>
			<align>inherit</align>
			<line_height>13px</line_height>
		</def>
	</font>
	<font>
		<title>Body Font</title>
		<id>body-font</id>
		<subtitle>body font subtitle</subtitle>
		<default>Poppins</default>
		<output>body</output>
		<def>
			<color>#3d3d3d</color>
			<size>13px</size>
			<line_height>16px</line_height>
			<family>Poppins</family>
			<weight>400</weight>
			<align>inherit</align>
		</def>
	</font>

	<font>
		<title>Title Font</title>
		<id>title-font</id>
		<subtitle>Title font, Page Title font</subtitle>
		<default>Poppins</default>
		<output>
			.heading-title.border-bottom-solid,
			.heading-title,
			h1.page-title,
			woocommerce-page div.product .product_title,
			.nth-quickshop-wrapper div.product .product_title
		</output>
		<def>
			<color>#3d3d3d</color>
			<size>20px</size>
			<line_height>30px</line_height>
			<family>Poppins</family>
			<weight>600</weight>
			<text_transform>capitalize</text_transform>
		</def>
	</font>

	<font>
		<title>Heading Font</title>
		<id>heading-font</id>
		<subtitle>Heading h1/h2/h3/h4/h5/h6 font</subtitle>
		<default>Poppins</default>
		<output>
			h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6
			.product_subcaterories .woo-subcat-wrapper .cat-title,
			li.widget .widget-heading h3,
			.entry-date,
			.nth-shopping-progress-wrapper,
			.widget_boxed .widget-heading h3,
			.woocommerce-checkout .nth-checkout-heading, 
			.woocommerce-checkout h3,
			span.amount,
			.woocommerce #payment #place_order
		</output>
		<def>
			<family>Poppins</family>
			<weight>700</weight>
			<text_transform>capitalize</text_transform>
		</def>
	</font>

	<font>
		<title>Product Label Font</title>
		<id>product-label-font</id>
		<subtitle>Product Label Font</subtitle>
		<default>Poppins</default>
		<output>
			.woocommerce .product-labels .product_label
		</output>
		<def>
			<color>#ffffff</color>
			<size>22px</size>
			<family>Poppins</family>
			<line_height>22px</line_height>
			<weight>700</weight>
			<text_transform>uppercase</text_transform>
		</def>
	</font>

	<font>
		<title>Tab Font</title>
		<id>tab-font</id>
		<subtitle>Tab Font</subtitle>
		<default>Poppins</default>
		<output>
			.vc_tta-style-classic.vc_tta-tabs.vc_general.nth-tab-style4 .vc_tta-tab > a
		</output>
		<def>
			<color>#3d3d3d</color>
			<size>20px</size>
			<family>Poppins</family>
			<line_height>30px</line_height>
			<weight>400</weight>
			<text_transform>capitalize</text_transform>
		</def>
	</font>

	<font>
		<title>Button Font</title>
		<id>button-font</id>
		<subtitle>Button Font</subtitle>
		<default>Poppins</default>
		<output>
			.woocommerce .wishlist_table td.product-add-to-cart a.add_to_cart, .woocommerce a.product_type_grouped, .woocommerce a.product_type_external, .woocommerce a.button.add_to_cart_button, .woocommerce a.button.out_stock, .woocommerce .button.alt.single_add_to_cart_button, .woocommerce-page .wishlist_table td.product-add-to-cart a.add_to_cart, .woocommerce-page a.product_type_grouped, .woocommerce-page a.product_type_external, .woocommerce-page a.button.add_to_cart_button, .woocommerce-page a.button.out_stock, .woocommerce-page .button.alt.single_add_to_cart_button
		</output>
		<def>
			<color>#ffffff</color>
			<size>12px</size>
			<family>Poppins</family>
			<line_height>18px</line_height>
			<weight>600</weight>
			<text_transform>uppercase</text_transform>
		</def>
	</font>
	
	<font>
		<title>Footer Font</title>
		<id>footer-font</id>
		<subtitle>footer font subtitle</subtitle>
		<default>Poppins</default>
		<output>footer, #footer</output>
		<def>
			<color>#5d5d5d</color>
			<size>13px</size>
			<family>Poppins</family>
			<weight>400</weight>
			<align>inherit</align>
			<line_height>13px</line_height>
		</def>
	</font>

	<font>
		<title>Footer Heading Title</title>
		<id>footer-heading-font</id>
		<subtitle>footer heading font</subtitle>
		<default>Poppins</default>
		<output>
			footer .heading-title, 
			#footer .heading-title
		</output>
		<def>
			<color>#1b75bb</color>
			<size>16px</size>
			<family>Poppins</family>
			<weight>700</weight>
			<align>inherit</align>
			<line_height>24px</line_height>
		</def>
	</font>
</fonts>
